title: Change emote binding
body:
Is there a way to change the new Emote bind. My trinket is bound to T. Now i cant place trinkets.

I've changed my trinket to 5 but id rather not mess with my set up for some stupid emote.

replies.body:
It's under communication of the hotkeys sections in settings... If i remember It doesn't appear in the settings of client or practice tool. Change it during a normal game or aram I suppose.
(its called quick emote or something like that)
ok cool. i only looked in the client. so i will check in game
